parameter.name: refreshInterval
parameter.label: Refresh Interval (Normal)
parameter.description: Interval in seconds at which monitor status is updated

parameter.name: discoveryInterval
parameter.label: Monitor Discovery Interval
parameter.description: Specifies time in seconds in which the binding will attempt to discover monitors

parameter.name: defaultAlarmDuration
parameter.label: Default Alarm Duration
parameter.description: Duration in seconds after which the alarm will be turned off

parameter.name: defaultImageRefreshInterval
parameter.label: Default Image Refresh Interval
parameter.description: Interval in seconds at which monitor image snapshot will be updated

parameter.name: host
parameter.label: Server
parameter.description: Zoneminder server name or IP address

parameter.name: useSSL
parameter.label: Use https
parameter.description: Enables use of https for connection to Zoneminder

parameter.name: urlPath
parameter.label: URL Path
parameter.description: URL path (Used if Zoneminder URL starts with something other than /zm)

parameter.name: user
parameter.label: User Name
parameter.description: User name (if authentication enabled in Zoneminder)

parameter.name: imageRefreshInterval
parameter.label: Image Refresh Interval
parameter.description: Interval in seconds with which monitor image is refreshed

parameter.name: alarmDuration
parameter.label: Alarm Duration
parameter.description: Duration in seconds after which the alarm will be turned off
